title: Unchained Alistar Skin???
body: Can you still get the Unchained Alistar Skin??? or was it just for a period of time???{{champion:12}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: Yup, you can still summon the free Minotaur to the fields of justice. Hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be happy to help reunite you two. ^.^
